description.p: ROS-Industrial support for the Motoman SIA50D (and variants).
This package contains configuration data, 3D models and launch files for Motoman SIA50D manipulators.

Joint limits and maximum joint velocities are based on the information found in the online https://www.motoman.com/en-us/products/robots/industrial/assembly-handling/sia-series/sia50d All urdfs are based on the default motion and joint velocity limits, unless noted otherwise.
Please note: The dynamic properties in this robot model are approximate and derived from CAD information. For exact dynamic properties, please contact Motoman (available via NDA).

p.strong: !!! THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN TESTED WITH A PHYSICAL ROBOT !!!

description.p: Before using any of the configuration files and / or meshes included in this package, be sure to check they are correct for the particular robot model and configuration you intend to use them with.
